description:
test: add a compiledir pattern in run.go

The compiledir pattern compiles all files xxx.dir/*.go
in lexicographic order (which is assumed to coincide with
the topological order of dependencies).

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, remy@archlinux.org),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, remy@archlinux.org),

Please take another look.

I like it. Please update test/testlib so that running ./run by hand still works.
Thanks.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=36047074c4dd ***

test: add a compiledir pattern in run.go

The compiledir pattern compiles all files xxx.dir/*.go
in lexicographic order (which is assumed to coincide with
the topological order of dependencies).

R=rsc
